info.name: Stylish 2.0.6 dark theme
info.description: Stylish 2.0.6 dark theme for Firefox browsers - tested with 45.0.1 (also compatible with Palemoon, tested with 26.2)
info.additionalInfo: Custom label or id # - the id's only relevant if using windowed mode, its good for 400 styles Check errors button - just checks without previewing, fine to remove if udont use Codemirror theme - changes text colors, modified versions of Codemirror dark themes, changed a few colors on most of them with varying success. None means devtools dark theme colors selected text color - main versions specific to codemirror, ::-moz-selection's used in textboxes & Palemoon font size/height - meaning Lucida Console & Dejavu Sans Mono, line heights the amount of space between lines For Firefox or Palemoon - Palemoon uses the standard editor, so no color text, line numbers or autocomplete Pm findbar autohide/replace - autohides a workaround since it doesnt minimize, replace cause its jumpy & the default browser findbar works in Stylish, just Ctrl+F on the urlbar to launch, so not usable in windowed mode • includes custom scrollbars, the horizontal autohides, improved the code, nolonger disappears when installed • also re-skins autocomplete, right-click, errors popup, findbar popup/results and foldgutter twisty/collapers

options.label: autohide
replace
options.value:
/*________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
 |                                                                                                                                | 
 |       ::: NEW SECTION REQUIRED FOR USERSTYLES INSTALL KEY TO ALLOW ANOTHER SECTION WITH NEW URL FOR PALEMOON FINDBAR :::       |
 | OPTION 1: have it autohide when not used, theres actually two workable methods, the 1st is better, autohides everything except |
 | textbox when nothings entered, the 2nd then autohides everything after 5 secs, to try that uncomment rules below using the *   |
 |________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________|*/
 
@-moz-document url-prefix("about:stylish-edit"),url-prefix("data:text/html") {

#findbar:not(hover) .findbar-find-fast.find-status-icon, 
#findbar:not(hover) .findbar-find-fast.findbar-find-status,
#stylish-edit.theme-body :-moz-any(.findbar-find-next,.findbar-find-previous)[disabled="true"] {
    transition-property: opacity; opacity: 0 
    }
#findbar:hover .findbar-find-fast.find-status-icon,
#findbar:hover .findbar-find-fast.findbar-find-status {    
    transition: opacity 1s 1s; opacity: 1 
    } /*
#findbar > hbox:not(hover) *  { 
    transition: opacity 0s 5s; opacity: 0 
    }
#findbar > hbox:hover *  { 
    transition: opacity 0s; opacity: 1 
    } */
/*________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
 |                                                                                                                                |
 | OPTION 2: collapse the findbar and use the standard browwser version - less buggy - just focus on the urlbar & Crl+F to launch |
 | so dont use this option in windowed mode, it also uses the same autohide approach above, only showing textbox when not used    |
 | - the stylish-url qualifiers mean the black background only shows on stylish urls, & only on 100 styles, add more if needed    | 
 |________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________|*/ 

#findbar.theme-toolbar { visibility: collapse } 

}
